dialogues.text: My house is next to the forest edge... I'm not coming out until I'm sure the danger is gone.
I stacked up on provisions, so I can last for weeks if necessary!

options.text: Have you seen anything suspicious lately?

dialogues.text: I was approached by a sinister elf who tried convincing me to join his cult! He presented his manifest to me.
He kept mentioning the importance of his work and how we brought this fog upon ourselves.
I'm not stupid, though. When I read 'Alchemy' in his manifest, I knew he was trouble. I kindly refused and he stormed off.
Hello, traveler. Word has it you found the cult. Is it true that the 'missing' elves actually joined the cult?
That's quite shocking, but to think that the Warden betrayed our trust is even more worrying.
